De proefles van :student_first_name met: The trial lesson of :student_first_name with :host_first_name was a success! This means that :student_first_name now officially receives guidance from :host_first_name.
De vakafspraken zijn definitief. Dat bet: The subject agreements are final. This means that lessons with :student_first_name will be scheduled every month according to these agreements. The subject agreements apply for a certain period. During the evaluation meeting, it will be assessed whether they need to be extended, modified, or terminated. This way, our guidance better meets the needs of the student.
U kunt de begeleiding volgen in onze web: You can follow the guidance in our web app. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Er is een vakafspraak :subject_name voor: A subject appointment :subject_name has been scheduled for you with :student_first_name. If the trial lesson is successful, you can schedule lessons with this subject appointment.

Jou vakafspraak :subject_name met :stude: Your subject appointment :subject_name with :student_first_name has been extended until :end_date. This means you can schedule lessons with this subject appointment until that date.
De vakafspraak met :student_first_name v: The subject appointment with :student_first_name for :subject_name has been completed. This means you can no longer schedule lessons with this subject appointment.

We werken met onze eigen webapp. Hiermee: We work with our own web app. This gives you access to the lessons, lesson reports, and other information regarding the guidance. You will be kept informed through automatically generated emails. This way, our guidance becomes even faster, more transparent, and more tailored to the needs of the student.
Klik op de onderstaande button om uw acc: Click the button below to activate your account. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Bij Studied werken we met onze eigen web: At Studied, we work with our own web app. This gives you access to the lessons, lesson reports, and other information regarding the guidance. You will be kept informed through automatically generated emails. This way, our guidance becomes even faster, more transparent, and more tailored to the needs of the student.

Bij Studied vinden we het contact met de: At Studied, we consider contact with the student's mentor and teacher to be just as important as contact with the student themselves, so we can support each student according to their needs. Feel free to contact us if you notice any new issues or have recommended practice materials!
We hopen u hiermee voldoende geïnformeer: We hope this has sufficiently informed you. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us!
